mapper.select: select c.id as id , c.ip as ip, b.id as appId, b.app_id as appAppId, b.path as path, b.package_name as packageName, b.port as port, a.id as strategyProjectId from strategy_project as a right join app as b on a.project_id = b.project_id left join strategy_project_app as c on a.id = c.strategy_project_id and b.id = c.app_id where a.id = #{id}
